original_title: Aspects of Kirkwall 2: Shape of a Town
overview: Second of the 'Aspects of Kirkwall' films about the changing face of Kirkwall over the years. Filmed in 1974, it features the primary school, various shops, St. Magnus Cathedral under scaffolding and general views of the area including land fill in the 'Peedie Sea'.
title: Aspects of Kirkwall 2: Shape of a Town
